articles.title: Dyson announced on the 10th that it has launched a consumer product of 'Supersonic r Hairdryer'.This..

It comes with five styling nozzles and is available in two colors with a recommended price of 629,000 won.

This launch aims to provide publishers with new user engagement tools and a revenue stream, while offering users a collaborative AI experience.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 vs Fold 6: Every difference that you wanted to know

Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy and running One UI 8 based on Android 16, the Galaxy Z Fold 7 is available in India starting at Rs 1,74,999.
